title: Manchester City vs Aston Villa - Premier League 2019/20: Live score and updates
text:
Manchester City host Aston Villa in midday Premier League action at the Etihad Stadium.

Pep Guardiola's men will know better than to underestimate a newly promoted Premier League side after their loss to Norwich City earlier in the season, as they look to narrow the gap on Liverpool's lead.

Villa will be looking to take their league winning streak to three against Man City, which will be the first time in the competition since 2010.

Sportsmail's Danny Gallagher will provide Premier League coverage of Man City vs Aston Villa including score, lineups and build-up.
description: Pep Guardiola's men will know better than to underestimate a newly promoted Premier League side after they loss to Norwich City as they look to narrow the gap on Liverpool's lead.
